title: Bill Don't Lie - Zach Lowe
description: Zach Lowe joins Bill Simmons to discuss Anthony Davis, the MVP race, and how Kawhi is looking like a top-10 player. Then they break down the NBA season by the numbers.
itunes:title: Bill Don't Lie - Zach Lowe
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Zach Lowe joins Bill Simmons to discuss Anthony Davis, the MVP race, and how Kawhi is looking like a top-10 player. Then they break down the NBA season by the numbers.
